Reviews.Title: “Home away from home!”
Reviews.Author: outahea2
Reviews.Content: We recently returned from a week stay at Sweetwater Club 1/27/12-2/3/12. We stayed in unit #43 which had 3 bedrooms and 2 baths, spacious living area, dining area, and full kitchen. Our unit was very clean and comfortable with pretty much everything you would need during your stay. The only things you need to provide are every day essentials such as toilet paper, paper towels and any cleaning supplies or soaps/detergents. I just wish I knew this when I booked so I could have brought some things with me from home instead of having to buy everything, but no big deal. Also, be sure to bring some extra washcloths from home so you won't have to do laundry every couple of days, they only provide 6 or 8. The complex is about 10 minutes from the parks and other attractions, has a heated pool and jacuzzi, and provides wifi at the club house. We were 4 adults traveling (my self & husband and both of my parents) the only thing that I could really complain about was the beds being a little small. The options were, queen, full or 2 double beds, both couples were used to a king size bed so one couple didn't sleep very well. I would suggest requesting an upstairs unit away from the road for adults traveling without small children. You will definitely be able to hear the people above you if you are on the first floor. You might also hear some road noise unless you are further on the inside of the property. Over all, I would definitely stay again or recommend to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent base for parks, give it a go!”
Reviews.Author: tom_h33
Reviews.Content: It is worth pointing out prior to this review that each of the condos' situated on the Sweetwater Club estate are independently owned, this review refers to number 42. This was the first time that my family and I had booked out vacation home without the assistance and relative safety of a travel agent and I have to say that I was apprehensive however the owners made the whole process as easy as it could be. The condo itself is superbly situated just of the 192 in the heart of everything. Disney is just 10 minutes by car, Seaworld and Universal Studios are 15 minutes and there are any amount of restaurants practically on your doorstep. The condo itself is very clean and well presented as well as providing everything you could need during your stay (including travel cots and car seats) and the owners were very responsive to my requests prior to our trip and stayed in communication throughout, even providing an information pack to assist us in our planning. So to recap, if you are looking for a base for your Orlando/Disney vacation that is clean, comfortable and homely then you couldn't get much better.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent home to finish off the day”
Reviews.Author: P Lloyd L
Reviews.Content: I rented a 3 bedroom home in Sweetwater Club and i have to tell you it was great. I have a Colonial Style home and i wanted an actual house not a hotel room while staying in FL. This was great because we were exhausted at the end of the day. If you pay all the money to go to the Parks i stay all day if i can and get my money's worth. i like to be able to come back to a home at the end of the night. Yes they are individually owned but at the end of the day you have to decide what works best for your family.

Reviews.Title: “not one of the better resorts”
Reviews.Author: mrbynum
Reviews.Content: This place has tons of potential but it needs an infusion of energy and cash. Our unit had a non-working tv remote, broken dining chair, a bad smell coming from behind the fridge, a blown bulb in the kids room and the mattresses and furniture had gone soft from over-use. It was located in a semi-residential and quiet area but not far at all from civilization. If you can, stay at Westgate.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice! Felt Like Home! Was ready to move there!”
Reviews.Author: tsajsamek
Reviews.Content: Location very close to Disney theme parks and Downtown Disney. Clean place with lots of amenities. These condos are privately owned, so it really depends on which unit you stay in. Our place was very nice and well maintained. We will return for regular vacations! Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “It was good enough”
Reviews.Author: jrtiger2
Reviews.Content: It was actually not bad at all, its not as luxurious as other resort but its good enough we stayed there for a week on a 3 bd room apartment, we booked it thru vacation brokers they were very accomodating like the other reviewer it depends on who maintaned the units coz we did not see any of the problems that the other ppl said.. The place was clean lots of supplies and they leave all the information you need on the counter, we did enjoy our stay there, we are actually going back there next year!

Reviews.Title: “Not the cleanest accomodations in the world”
Reviews.Author: johnlorenzo_2001
Reviews.Content: Nice place to stay if you intend on keeping busy at the attractions, we spent seven days at SweetWater Club. We arrived to a dirty entrance way, ceramic tile floors were filthy. White socks became brown after a very short time walking around the condo. cob webs everywhere, and broken tv remote. Im sorry but when I'm on vacation I don't expect to lift a finger to enjoy the accomodations. We paid good money to have this unit available. We were however pleased with the kitchen and the amenities it offered, well equipped. We were very disappointed with the security of the complex, 4 nights into our stay someone broke into my personal minivan in the parking lot and stold many of our personal things, when I asked the management if there was anything they could do they simply replied no. Call the police. There is a sign that says property under 24 hour video surveillance. I suppose thats just for asthetic purposes. As I said we found the place to be filthy, with previous occupants hair everywhere. We arrived a little early at Florida Vacation Villas as we drove down and allowed plenty of extra time, so we took or chances checking in at 12 noon to my surprise the unit was supoosedly ready, had I known it was filthy prior to check in we would have glady waited the extra time to allow them to prepare it for my family and I. Overall we had a good time and would do it again, maybe choose a different condo through our network,

Reviews.Title: “Very homey!”
Reviews.Author: razzzbere
Reviews.Content: We found this place through [--] and it is privately owned by Holli & Tom Shaw. An excellent choice as we needed 3 bedrooms. It was immaculate...very comfy and quiet. The price was right, just $500 for the week. We had a fully stocked kitchen, dining area, comfy living room and 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. One room had 2 twins, one had a queen and the master had a king bed and private bath. Huge closets in every room as well as tv's. The resort is not luxurious but it is very nice and has a nice pool and hot tub. We rented a car and it was easy to find, just off of I 192 where all of the shops and restaurants are...very close to Super Target. Roughly a 15 minute drive to Disney parks...no traffic! Would definately stay here again. Bravo Holli & Tom!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Home from Home, Give it a go!”
Reviews.Author: The-Martins
Reviews.Content: Block 2442 Unit 42 Sweetwater Club Circle, Kissimmee Don’t let the previous reviews scare you off this lovely development. It’s important that you are aware that all units are individually owned and therefore individually styled and cared for. As we understand it, the owner’s employ different management companies to manage clean, maintain the properties. Our particular condo we hired was through www.going2orlando.com Sweetwater is in a great position in a quiet location just off the main road that runs through Kissimmee (highway 192) with lots of shopping and restaurants and about 20mins drive to Disney and the other parks. Our unit was a spacious 3 bedroom with all the amenities you need; a large living space, TVs in living area and two of the bedrooms (with plenty of channels to choose from). A fully equipped kitchen including a microwave, dishwasher plus a washing machine and a dryer. The master bedroom had a lovely king size bed with the most comfortable mattress I have ever slept on (which I said to my husband every single night) the two other bedrooms were a twin room and a double room, there is also a small balcony/terrace out the back of the master bedroom. What we found really useful was they had all the little extras you need ie, washing up liquid, washing powder, dish washer tablets, cleaning up sponges, kitchen role and hand wash in the bathrooms and toilet paper. Plus there were always plenty of towels and extra blankets and pillows. The grounds are well kept and the pool area is well maintained. There was also a volleyball court and tennis courts. The clubhouse staff were always courteous and helpful, and complimentary coffee was available throughout the morning, ‘Flor’ (clubhouse lady) was particularly pleasant and very helpful and made us feel right at home. I can’t stress enough that these units are individually owned and managed (even though a number of units could be managed by the same management company). Therefore the cleanliness and overall perception of the condo will ultimately rest with the management company. This seems to be quite evident from the inconsistent reviews so far. With this in mind I can only form an opinion that some management companies are far better than others. From personal experience we can safely say that block unit 42 managed by [--] was a lovely place to stay and would regard Sweetwater as our second home. Don’t just take our word for it, have a look at the pictures attached. If you choose to leave a review for Sweetwater – please include the block number and unit number you stayed in plus the company you used to book with – this will highlight the good, the bad and the ugly…and in turn help future visitors select well kept clean condos.

Reviews.Title: “Not what I expected”
Reviews.Author: Lovetotravelnj
Reviews.Content: I came back from Florida today. The location is good (close to highway 192). The entrance to the Villas seemed inviting enough but the entrance to the unit I stayed was a different case. There were dirt, spider webs and various bugs all over the place. Upon entrance, the tiles in the living area appear clean. The kitchen was clean and furnished with full refrigerator, dishwasher, range and microwave. The unit had a coffee maker that had ground -in dirt - had to be sanitized before use. The unit had two TVs and a VCR (never tried the VCR). It claimed to have cable but there was no CNN. Local calls were supposed to be free but there was no access - it prompts you for credit card for the local calls. The towels and beddings were dingy. I had to wash these in the dated washing machine (rusty) before using them. The sofa and couch and the dining chairs were faded and dingy. I had to lay a sheet on the sofa. The bathrooms looked like they were cleaned but not thoroughly. There were spiders and ants crawling all over. I had to clean the bathrooms before using them. There were missing or mismatch window screens. The gardeners left dirt on the walkway and when I spoke to the manager after the 3rd day, he told me to get a broom from the unit and clean it myself. The wireless does not work in the units. The clubhouse computer is extremely slow and the use is $5/30 mins. The vacation was supposed to be for rest and relaxation but I did more work cleaning up than resting. I had to cut short my vacation and paid extra to fly back home early. Suffice to say that I was very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Please don't go here, you will regret it”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This Place Sucked don't go there. Waste of money and bugs everywhere and mold all over the sheets and the shower and also I had to make a report to the management about a peeper by my shower window, Not at all worth it I would have rather stayed in a tent. There are way more Villas better than this one. Never again.

Reviews.Title: “Not so bad”
Reviews.Author: beachcorona
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my family for a week at the Sweetwater Club Villas in Kissimmee just before Christmas. Great location, 2 minutes from the main street in Kissimme (highway 192) with lots of shopping and restaurants and only a quick drive to Disney and the other parks. Good size condo, great bedroom sizes, one with 2 twin beds, one with a queen and walk-in closet, and a master with queen bed, balcony, walk-in closet, and ensuite bath with shower only. Bathrooms are pretty dated, cracks in the caulking, cupboards very dated, floors cracking, showers moldy. The worst part was the window in the ensuite shower must have been put in backwards, because you can't see out the window but people outside can see you, so look out ladies!!! Couldn't get the DVD player working so we didn't get to enjoy that, but there was a VCR. Pool was good, warm. Hot tub very relaxing. Except they kick you out about 15 minutes before closing time! Kitchen facilities were perfect, except again counters and cupboards were very dated. Other than those minimal things, we had a pretty good time. We did find 3 cockroaches though, thank GOD I didn't see them, the others found them, 2 alive, 1 dead! YUCK! I would recommend it for other probably. Just don't go when there is CRAPPY weather like we did!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “A truly great stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Sweetwater on several occasions and have found different units to have been ideal for our holidays in the Kissimmee area. They have been generally clean (dependent on the rental company and their cleaning services) not the staff at the club house who have been courteous and extremely helpful. The Sweetwater condos are close to the main attractions and the restaurants on Highway 192, and close to the airport (Orlando), and have good amenities to make your vacation a truly memorable experience. We regard Sweetwater as our second home and are good value for money compared to hotels and motels as you can sleep 6 to 8 people. In fact we like the place so much!!! that last year we bought one of the properties. Must be good!!! Give it a try!!!

Reviews.Title: “Poor customer relations”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The overall appearence was good, but we had problems with the unit. The carpet was dirty, the toilet seat in the master bathroom needs to be replaced, one of the kitchen cabinet doors was hanging by one hinge, the refrig has a broken door handle, there are missing window blinds, the dryer took 5 hours to dry a load of towels, the lamp in the second bedroom is broken, there are missing window screens, there is no television service, when I asked the manager of the complex to placed me in touch with someone responsible for the unit, he lied and said he did not know who I could contact, or call. I doubt that I would ever stay at this resort again.

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This place was terrible! We could only use two of the three bedrooms due to mold on the sheets in the third. The carpet was dirty along with the bathrooms. Management did nothing for us. I would avoid this place like the plague.

Reviews.Title: “Sweetwater is the BEST!!”
Reviews.Author: grammiegail
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a 12 day visit to Kissimmee. The Sweetwater Club was wonderful. Spacious unit, quiet location and beautiful grounds. I would highly recommend it. We hope to be able to stay there again next year.

HotelInfo.Name: Sweetwater Club Villas and Apartments
HotelInfo.Address: 2462 Sweetwater Club Circle, Kissimmee, FL 32746
